data.message: Am glad am here on time,so I can watch the trump supporters cry all over again...also, drop the damn album already man!!..don't play with our feelings like that

replies.message: Think it was spose to b today it's not on rhapsody yet the single wasn't released until the afternoon last week so it still can b today
You and trump look alike.

All the comments I see are from people talking about trump supporters, not from trump supporters. It's getting boring now both sides need to give it a rest.
Great performance from eminem, loved it..
Lol I assume you became a fan 3 weeks ago??
Isn't the album supposed to drop today???
The song sucks ass but i hope the album is better. And before you judge you ignorant fucks, read.

When did Trump supporters make a 6 minute "freestyle" crying about Trump? Wasn't that Eminem? Oh yeah, it was 😂.

No reason to cry. Trump is President and no amount of crying from you or a 40+ year old washed up rapper will change that anytime soon. Get. Over. It.
Cry over crap? Haha. No :)

"Washed up rapper"
People are still trying to use that lie?
Brandon Morales what lie? If you think any if his albums are even close to his big 3, then you need to look in a mirror because you're way too far up another mans ass.

Michael Curatolo... So washed up that you're on his post commenting.... So washed up when he drops a song and it had 20m views in a day and a half... "Washed up"... You're just salty he made fun of a joke of a president... Just like 75% of the world does... Dumb fool didn't even have the majority vote...Nobody wants that clown running a country... Well only you and idiots like you...
People like Jordan Ochs are why Trump won in the first place.
Did you get stung in the bottom lip by A bee?

Jordan Ochs salty over what? He's the President lol. No amount of bitching or crying from your bum ass or a 40+ year old washed up rapper, is going to change that. Deal with it and, get. Over. It.

PS...too bad for you the majority vote doesn't win you the election. That's why there's a thing called a electoral college in place, and for good reason. If it wasn't, this country probably wouldn't exist because we'd have a bunch of pussys running the country for the last century+. Again, get over it 😭
Michael Curatolo says the guys who's probably licking Trump's balls on a daily basis... you sound like a fan boy that is out of arguments.

David Bernatchez I don't know what a "fanboy" is, nor do I use phrases that 8-16 year olds use. Corny as fuck.

And I didn't even vote for Trump, so way to go on your ASSumption bud 👍.

Don't need any argument. Trump is President. Get over it and deal with it cry baby 😭.

David Bernatchez lol. Just looked at your profile for 2 seconds and you even cry about Trump on that. So my assumption is correct that you are a typical libtard cry baby who can't get over Donald Trump as President of the United States of America 😂.
Trump rules cry some where else  baby
Not releasing. Single flopped lol
Jordan Ochs All of his previous singles sold 300,000 digital copies their week of release. Walk on Water sold 75,000 lol #flop

Brandon Morales right, do you hear what these kids are listening to today?  To each it’s own, but today’s I guess rap (if that’s what you want to call it)is weak as fuck.  No talent, just image.  I’d love to see one “rapper” from today go toe to toe with Eminem.  These kids are all about that mumble shit.
Jeff Sands guess I won’t ask your mom for a ride to work tomorrow.  Yeah, I went there

Hopsin and Eminem having a rap off would be epic. Eminem just became a sellout like most famous artists reason they produce garbage after the stuff that made them famous and actually had a deep meaning
I mean bringing up politics in music is a huge sign of being a sellout. Your just feeding the masses because no one is listening to your shit
